title: What industries outsource the most? - Quora

response.answer_text: Outsourcing is contacting the other persons or companies and by making contract assigning them the non-core activities of the contacting company. It is the cheapest way of getting the work done by other persons and employing the own staff on key issues only as it enhances the productivity of their work. Now a day there is no sector left which do not outsource their work. In starting IT sector started outsourcing their work from other countries or even within their country from other companies or individuals. After that other sector also started outsourcing their work and these are mostly accounting, no-accounting, insurance sector, law, healthcare, telecom business and many others these are the work which is outsourced mostly in every country.
